gameDetails.name: Carcassonne: The River II
gameDetails.description:
The River II (Der Fluss II) is a mini-expansion for Carcassonne. It adds twelve tiles with a river and has some differences with the first River expansion because the tiles are designed to combine with the first three expansions for Carcassonne, Inns & Cathedrals, Traders & Builders and The Princess & the Dragon.  The River II is contained in Carcassonne: Expansion 6 â€“ Count, King & Robber

The river tiles are placed first, after that the game continues as normal. 
Part of the Carcassonne series.

Expands:

    Carcassonne
